name: The Egg Shift
description:
A small, short game made for the Low Effort Jam 10.

You have decided to work at this egg collection shop.  You have to battle eggs to get their... eggs and use those eggs to complete orders. 

Rest in the shop to regain health, purchase drinks to help in battle and hire new members of your team.  

Controls Keyboard 

Arrow keys -  Movement

Z - Select

X- Menu / Cancel

Mouse

Left click - move to point/select

Right click - Menu/ Cancel

Touchscreen

1 finger- move to point/select

2 finger tap - Menu/ Cancel

Credits

Game  Engine and RTP Assets - RPG Maker MV

Menu Plugin - Mjshi

Enemy Sprites - Ace Savaid
